thread.title: Hotel 414 fantastic boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Hotel 414 fantastic boutique hotel - Review of 414 Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Philip Z
title: Hotel 414 fantastic boutique hotel
text: Great location, Close to theater district but far enough away from the hustle and bustle of Times Square. The staff is fantastic and it's a lot of fun sitting in the lobby interacting with other guests from all over the world. I highly recommend Hotel 414. We have stayed in hotels all over Manhattan and this is our favorite.
